title: What should I do when I found academic dishonesty? - Quora

response.answer_text: That depends on where you are located. Most academic institutions have mechanisms for reporting dishonesty. I suggest you find those channels, and ask something of the form, “I may have misunderstood, and if so, please forgive me, but it seems to me that this might be incorrect…” just in case you are wrong.

Academic dishonesty is prevalent. The professors that support GMO’s, fluoride and vaccinations are all based in dishonesty and bought by the manufacturers and other sources promoting reducing the population. So beware who you contact.
